metadata.Title: CVE-2023-40589 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
FreeRDP is a free implementation of the Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP),released under the Apache license. In affected versions there is aGlobal-Buffer-Overflow in the ncrush_decompress function. Feeding craftedinput into this function can trigger the overflow which has only been shownto cause a crash. This issue has been addressed in versions 2.11.0 and3.0.0-beta3. Users are advised to upgrade. There are no known workaroundsfor this issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-40589` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freerdp2-shadow-x11 - 2.10.0+dfsg1-1.1ubuntu1
freerdp2-wayland - 2.10.0+dfsg1-1.1ubuntu1
freerdp2-x11 - 2.10.0+dfsg1-1.1ubuntu1
libfreerdp-client2-2 - 2.10.0+dfsg1-1.1ubuntu1
libfreerdp-server2-2 - 2.10.0+dfsg1-1.1ubuntu1
libfreerdp-shadow-subsystem2-2 - 2.10.0+dfsg1-1.1ubuntu1
libfreerdp-shadow2-2 - 2.10.0+dfsg1-1.1ubuntu1
libfreerdp2-2 - 2.10.0+dfsg1-1.1ubuntu1
libuwac0-0 - 2.10.0+dfsg1-1.1ubuntu1
libwinpr-tools2-2 - 2.10.0+dfsg1-1.1ubuntu1
libwinpr2-2 - 2.10.0+dfsg1-1.1ubuntu1
winpr-utils - 2.10.0+dfsg1-1.1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freerdp2 package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.10.0+dfsg1-1.1ubuntu1').
